thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Glu Reports Q4 Revenue Rose 73 Pct To $80.2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Glu Reports Q4 Revenue Rose 73 Pct To $80.2 Mln
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Glu Mobile Inc:
* GLU REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 73 PERCENT TO $80.2 MILLION * Q4 BOOKINGS GROW 44% YEAR OVER YEAR TO $83.2 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.29 * SEES Q1 2018 BOOKINGS $72 MILLION TO $74 MILLION * SEES FULL YEAR 2018 BOOKINGS $325 MILLION TO $335 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03, REVENUE VIEW $77.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
